ingredients: 2 cups all-purpose flour, 1 teaspoon baking powder, 1 teaspoon baking soda, 1 teaspoon salt, 3  ripe bananas, mashed, 1 tablespoon milk, 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon, or to taste, 1 cup white sugar,   +   1/2 cup butter, softened, 2 large eggs, 1 cup semisweet chocolate chips
nutrition: Total Fat 16g 20%, Saturated Fat 9g 46%, Cholesterol 62mg 21%, Sodium 490mg 21%, Total Carbohydrate 58g 21%, Dietary Fiber 3g 10%, Total Sugars 34g, Protein 5g, Vitamin C 3mg 16%, Calcium 50mg 4%, Iron 2mg 11%, Potassium 235mg 5%
